features: Slim fit: which means that it will sit snug against the body.
Ultra soft Modal/Cotton fabric holds shape and is meant to hug your natural body without being restrictive like shape wear.
This style is a V-neck with slightly lower armhole, so if you prefer a more covered up, modest look please size up.
Women over 5’ 6” may want to size up for better length coverage.
RP Styling tip: We recommend wearing it back to vintage denim or loose high waist trousers for balanced and flattering shape.
Wash warm, tumble dry low. Repeat.
